{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = ER-6p-2.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Ubiquiti EdgeMAX EdgeRouter 6P (ER-6P) |caption2 = ''6-Port Router with SFP/RJ45 PoE Ports'' (ER-RMKIT - Rack 19") |pp = https://www.ubnt.com/edgemax/edgerouter-6p/ |sp = https://help.ubnt.com/hc/en-us/categories/200321064-EdgeMAX |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Ubiquiti_Networks_EdgeRouter_6P_(ER-6P) |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Ubiquiti Networks |model = EdgeRouter |submodelappend = yes |submodel = 6P |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = ER-6P |page_start_date = June 6, 2018 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Ubiquiti_Networks_EdgeRouter_6P_(ER-6P) |series = EdgeRouter |type = router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Cavium;CN7130; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = MIPS |cpu1_type_rev = 64 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz <!-- 800 MHz / 1.0 / 1.2 / 1.5 / 1.6 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = SanDisk;SDIN7DP2-4G; |flash1size = 4 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;MX25L6408EMI-12G; |flash2size = 8 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = SK hynix;H5TC4G63CFR-PBA; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337N; |lan_ports = 5 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = FC:EC:DA
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2013.07;; |stockos = Linux;4.9.79-UBNT;EdgeOS;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0, SFP |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_sfp_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 110-240 |pwr_ac_hz = 50/60 |pwr_amp_ac = 0.5 |pwr_poe_type = 24V passive |pwr_poe = <!-- POE Volts --> |pwr_poe_amp = <!-- POE Amps --> |pwr_conn = C13
|serial = yes,, console port (RJ45),, (115200 8N1) |jtag = yes
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = PoE, SFP port, heatsink, metal case, |addchip = 3A, 36V, 500kHz Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Richtek;RT7272B;;5;,,, 1MHz, 2.0A, Synchronous-Rectified Buck Converter;uPI Semi; uP9617;;4;,,, 30V N-Channel AlphaMOS;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AON7524;;2;,, Multichannel RS-232 Line Driver;Texas Instruments;MA3221C;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel MOSFET;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AO4566;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel Power MOSFET;Unisonic Tech;UT4392G;;1;,,, 60V P-Channel MOSFET;Vishay Siliconix;Si9407B;;10;,,, 4-Output PCIe Clock Buffer/Level Translator;TI;LMK00334;;1;,,, DDR2/DDR3/DDR3L Memory Power Synchronous Buck Controller;Texas Instruments;TPS51216;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = ubnt |defaultpass = ubnt |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 239 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAD6H8BA2406 |asin = B07BMJ91Q8 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B07CT6JR98 |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== 'ER_POE_G2' is silkscreened on the board.
